briefdescription.para: Return number of online CPUs using sysconf.

simplesect.para: CPUs (>=1) on success; 1 as a conservative fallback.

briefdescription.para: Read an integer from a text file.

detaileddescription.para: Accepts trailing newline. Ignores leading whitespace.

simplesect.para: 0 on success; negative errno-like on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *s, int node_id, int *cpu2node, int cap)
memberdef.name: apply_cpulist_to_node

briefdescription.para: Apply a Linux cpulist string (e.g., "0-3,8,10-11") to mark node for CPUs.

parameterdescription.para: Array of length cap; will be set to node_id for listed CPUs.

briefdescription.para: Discover sockets using per-CPU physical_package_id in sysfs.

parameterdescription.para: Output array length n_cpus (initialized to -1 before call).

simplesect.para: Count of distinct sockets (>=0). 0 means not found.

briefdescription.para: Discover NUMA nodes by parsing node cpulist files in sysfs.

detaileddescription.para: Probes "/sys/devices/system/node/node<N>/cpulist" for existing node directories and applies their ranges to the cpu->node map.
Missing directories or files are tolerated. Unknown entries are ignored.

parameterdescription.para: Output array length n_cpus (initialized to -1 before call).

simplesect.para: Count of nodes discovered (>=0). 0 means not found.

memberdef.argsstring: (int n_cpus, int n_sockets, const int *cpu2socket, int *out_first)
memberdef.name: compute_first_cpu_per_socket

briefdescription.para: Compute a small representative CPU per socket.

parameterdescription.para: Output length n_sockets; filled with first CPU id or -1.

briefdescription.para: Initialize and build a topology handle.

detaileddescription.para:
This probes the host to discover:
total online CPUs
socket id for each CPU
NUMA node id for each CPU A best-effort approach is used; missing information is replaced by a consistent single-socket, single-node fallback.

parameterdescription.para: Output pointer to receive a newly allocated handle (non-NULL).

simplesect.para: 0 on success; negative errno-like value on failure (e.g., -12 for OOM).

briefdescription.para: Free topology handle created by ie_topology_init().

detaileddescription.para: Free a previously created topology handle.
Return the number of online CPUs observed during discovery.
Return the number of sockets (physical packages).
Return the number of NUMA nodes discovered.
Map a CPU id to its socket id.
Map a CPU id to its NUMA node id.

briefdescription.para: First (smallest id) CPU present on a given socket.

detaileddescription.para: Return a representative CPU id that belongs to the given socket.

simplesect.para: CPU id (>=0) or -1 on invalid socket.

briefdescription.para: Bind the current thread/process to a representative CPU of a socket.

simplesect.para: 0 on success; negative errno-like on failure.
